amendment.description: To require the Government Accountability Office to carry out a study evaluating the effectiveness of activities funded by the Harbor Maintenance Trust Fund in maximizing economic growth and job creation in port communities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 896 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 896 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Wyden.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 896 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Wyden.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 896 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
